name: Project KAJA
description:
The year is 2156. Human occupation on Mars has thrived for hundreds of years since the first excursion to the Red Planet in 2097. While most of the planet has been terraformed and humans can now experience life not unlike, if not better than that or crowded Earth, there are still pockets of unexplored terrain on the planet. 

Project Kaja, a research expedition focusing on the unknown of Mars recently spotted unidentified ruins on the east side of the planet. 

Project Kaja prepares to send their latest research probe to the location of the ruins to investigate. 

Final exam game created in 2nd year - WITS University
